definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
King Jie, the final ruler of the Xia dynasty (until c. 1600 BC), a notoriously cruel and immoral tyrant
see 桀驁不馴|桀骜不驯[jie2 ao4 bu4 xun4]
see 桀驁不馴|桀骜不驯[jie2 ao4 bu4 xun4]

sentences.english: Jie was extremely tyrannical and dissolute.
sentences.chinese: 桀是个极端残暴，放荡的人。

sentences.english: Jie, the last ruler, was said to be a corrupt king.
sentences.chinese: 桀，夏朝的最后一个统治者，被说成是一个暴君。

sentences.english: The emperor Cha Jie is one Leng, disheveled hair immediately.
sentences.chinese: 帝刹桀一愣，被发现了么。

sentences.english: Written during the reign of Emperor Qin c. 1600 BC.
sentences.chinese: 记载于公元前1600年桀统治时期。

sentences.english: The emperor Cha Jie tries to treat emperor one madam with the personality favor this.
sentences.chinese: 帝刹桀试图用这样的身份去看待帝一夫人。

sentences.english: Jie and Zhou led on the kingdom with violence, and people followed them.
sentences.chinese: 桀和纣带领天下暴虐无道，百姓也就跟随着抢夺作乱。

sentences.english: After overthrowing Jie, you want me to replace him.
sentences.chinese: 将桀推翻后你又想我去接桀的王位。

sentences.english: So emperor Cha the Jie is malicious the heart didn't say what, just be don't hear.
sentences.chinese: 所以帝刹桀狠了心的没有说什么，只是当没听见。

sentences.english: No surprise that emperor Cha Jie so of fret oneself.
sentences.chinese: 怪不得帝刹桀那样的担心自己。

sentences.english: Emperor Cha Jie what the smart woman have never seen, will favor you.
sentences.chinese: 帝刹桀什么漂亮的女人没见过，会喜欢你。

sentences.english: According to their standards, Jie and Robber Zhi were evil persons, while Zen Can and Shi You were kind.
sentences.chinese: 在他们仁义的标准里，坏人有桀及跖，好人有曾史等。

definition: to peel with a knife/old variant of 戮[lu4]
to amputate one or both feet (punishment in imperial China)/see also 五刑[wu3 xing2]
to bend/to violate/to go against/ruthless and tyrannical
a noble steed (literary)/(of a horse) untamed/(fig.) (of a person) headstrong/Taiwan pr. [ao2]
